meanings.definition: An Italian liqueur made from anise and elderberries.
meanings.sent1: I tried a sip of sambuca at the Italian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The bartender poured a shot of sambuca for the customer.
meanings.sent3: The sambuca danced on my taste buds with its unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: The sambuca was a sweet symphony of anise and elderberries.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sambuca filled the room, enticing everyone to try a taste.

meanings.definition: A type of alcoholic beverage typically served as a shot.
meanings.sent1: She ordered a round of sambuca shots for her friends.
meanings.sent2: The party started with a toast of sambuca shots.
meanings.sent3: The sambuca shots lined up on the bar like little soldiers.
meanings.sent4: The sambuca shot hit him like a flavorful punch.
meanings.sent5: The fiery sambuca shot warmed them up on the chilly evening.
